oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Swiss American Sketchbook, Auguste Burnand 003
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Auguste Burnand
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Swiss American Sketchbook, Auguste Burnand 003. Vue de la maison Chavannes pris du cote est. 1855. View of the Chavannes house from the east side, 1855. From the Swiss American Sketchbook with drawings by French-Swiss traveling artist Auguste Burnand (ca. 1835-ca. 1860?). He lived in the Swiss American community near Knoxville, TN, from 1853-1860.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houses; Dogs; Drawings;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
